meanings: Noun (허구적인, 재미있는) 이야기 (→fairy story, ghost story, short story)
Noun (실제 있었던 일에 대한) 이야기[말] (→cock and bull story, hard-luck story, life story, shaggy-dog story, sob story, success story, t...
Noun (과거의 사건들을 담은) 이야기, 일대기, 역사
Transitive verb 이야기[역사적 그림]로 꾸미다, [고어] 이야기하다

meanings.meaning: Strategy Training and Organizing Resources for Youth

vlive.korean: 저흰 'L.O.Λ.E STORY'라고 얘기를 안 했는데 다 어떻게 알았죠? We didn't say "L.O.Λ.E STORY" but how did you know?? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: We didn't say "L.O.Λ.E STORY" but how did you know??

vlive.korean: "재밌는 연습생 에피소드"? "A fun story from your trainee days"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준이와 소통먹방
vlive.english: "A fun story from your trainee days"?

vlive.korean: "무서운 얘기""무서운 얘기""무서운 얘기" "무서운 얘기 레츠 고!" "Scary story"," Scary story", "Scary story". "Scary story, let's go"! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: "Scary story"," Scary story", "Scary story". "Scary story, let's go"!

vlive.korean: 아까 그 자판기 얘기는 뭐예요? What was that with the vending machine story back there? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 마지막화) 5분 만에 전남친한테 최고의 복수하는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.10
vlive.english: What was that with the vending machine story back there?

vlive.korean: '천녀유혼'이랑 헷갈려 어떡해! 이러면 안돼! I am getting mixed up with "A Chinese Ghost Story." 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
vlive.english: I am getting mixed up with "A Chinese Ghost Story."

examples.korean: We have no way of verifying his story. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그의 이야기를 확인할 길이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We have no way of verifying his story. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The reader is told the story in flashback. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 독자는 그 이야기를 회상 형식으로 듣게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The reader is told the story in flashback. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They questioned the veracity of her story. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그녀 이야기의 진실성에 의문을 가졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They questioned the veracity of her story. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This story, it later transpired, was untrue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나중에 알고 보니 이 이야기는 사실이 아니었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This story, it later transpired, was untrue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The story rapidly became part of family folklore. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 이야기는 빠르게 가문의 전통의 일부가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The story rapidly became part of family folklore. Add to Wordbook
